data.name: Masters of Puzzle - Steampunk Hearse
data.detailed_description:
We would like to introduce you to Steampunk Hearse - another beautiful artwork from the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This illustration is part of our Steampunk Visions collection by that author, so make sure to check out the rest of the puzzle boxes in it.

Content Details

Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle is of low difficulty, making it suitable for beginners and or players looking for a non-challenging playthrough. There are quite a lot of very distinct elements and no uniform areas at all, which should help you reconstruct the full image without too much trouble. Of course, if you find it too easy, you can always give it a try with a higher number of puzzle tiles.

data.short_description: A traditional art puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.
data.supported_languages: English, Bulgarian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 133 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 133 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change
